why: To manually commit and push changes when triggered by user
name: Manual Commit and Push
description: Manually commits all changes with a detailed commit message and pushes to main branch
outputPrompt:
Run the following git commands to commit and push changes:

git diff --quiet && git diff --staged --quiet && echo "No changes to commit" && exit 0
echo "Files changed:"
git diff --cached --name-only
git add .
COMMIT_MSG="$(
  echo "$(git diff --cached --name-only | head -1 | sed 's/\.[^.]*$//' | sed 's/.*\///'): $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')"
  echo ""
  echo "Modified files:"
  git diff --cached --name-only | sed 's/^/- /'
  echo ""
  echo "Changes: $(git diff --cached --shortstat)"
)"
git commit -m "$COMMIT_MSG"
git push origin main
